comments.author: rpratama
comments.text: There are 2 ESP8266 Modules running separately updating to the same channel. 1 ESP8266 running Nodemcu firmware connected to GPIO0 to BMP180 and BH1750 using I2C protocol. Running lua script. 1 ESP8266 running espressif AT Firmware running  Arduino Nano v3 SoftSerial(10,11/TX,RX) and connected to DHT22 (D9)   and ACS721 30A (A0)Hall effect sensor to measure current. Updating to thingspeak via Simple AT Command/

comments.author: rpratama
comments.text: The module is now updated running 1. Nodemcu v 1.02. Nodemcu v 0.93. ESP6266 ESP-01 Sensor being use, DHT22, DHT11, BMP180, BH1750. this is part of smart home as all the data is also uploaded to MQTT server running Hass.io on raspberry pi 3B
